short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds the Maidenhead Grid Locator based on the user's location or manual coordinates input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the power of grid locators with the 9M2PJU Grid Locator Finder! This Chrome extension is designed for amateur radio enthusiasts, allowing users to quickly find and display their grid locators with ease.

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju


Key Features:

Quick Lookup: Instantly find grid locators based on your location or by entering specific coordinates.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a simple and intuitive design that makes finding grid locators a breeze.
Comprehensive Information: Access detailed information about each grid square, including its geographical context and related data.
Share Your Location: Easily share your grid locator with friends or fellow operators through social media or messaging platforms.
Who Can Benefit?

Whether youâ€™re a seasoned ham operator, a newcomer to amateur radio, or just curious about grid locators, this extension provides a valuable tool for enhancing your communication experience.

Get Started:

Add the 9M2PJU Grid Locator Finder to your Chrome browser today and simplify your grid locator lookups!

For more info, visit https://hamradio.my
